Docs.summary: Gets the raw value of the attribute or property as a stream.
Docs.remarks: Gets the raw value of the attribute or property as a stream.
Docs.exception: The property does not contain any more values.

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the current property is a computed property.
Docs.value: true if the current property is a computed property; otherwise, false.
Docs.remarks: Gets a value indicating whether the current property is a computed property.

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the current property is an embedded TNEF message.
Docs.value: true if the current property is an embedded TNEF message; otherwise, false.
Docs.remarks: Gets a value indicating whether the current property is an embedded TNEF message.

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the current property has a large value.
Docs.value: true if the current property has a large value; otherwise, false.
Docs.remarks: Gets a value indicating whether the current property has a large value.

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether or not the current property has multiple values.
Docs.value: true if the current property has multiple values; otherwise, false.
Docs.remarks: Gets a value indicating whether or not the current property has multiple values.

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether or not the current property is a named property.
Docs.value: true if the current property is a named property; otherwise, false.
Docs.remarks: Gets a value indicating whether or not the current property is a named property.

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the current property contains object values.
Docs.value: true if the current property contains object values; otherwise, false.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool ReadNextProperty() cil managed

Docs.summary: Advances to the next MAPI property.
Docs.returns: true if there is another property available to be read; otherwise false.
Docs.remarks: Advances to the next MAPI property.
Docs.exception: The TNEF data is corrupt or invalid.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool ReadNextRow() cil managed

Docs.summary: Advances to the next table row of properties.
Docs.returns: true if there is another row available to be read; otherwise false.
Docs.remarks: Advances to the next table row of properties.
Docs.exception: The TNEF data is corrupt or invalid.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool ReadNextValue() cil managed

Docs.summary: Advances to the next value in the TNEF stream.
Docs.returns: true if there is another value available to be read; otherwise false.
Docs.remarks: Advances to the next value in the TNEF stream.
Docs.exception: The TNEF data is corrupt or invalid.

MemberSignature.Value: public int ReadRawValue (byte[] buffer, int offset, int count);
.method public hidebysig instance int32 ReadRawValue(unsigned int8[] buffer, int32 offset, int32 count) cil managed

Docs.param: The buffer to read data into.
The offset into the buffer to start reading data.
The number of bytes to read.
Docs.summary: Reads the raw attribute or property value as a sequence of bytes.
Docs.returns: The total number of bytes read into the buffer. This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero (0) if the end of the stream has been reached.
Docs.remarks: Reads the raw attribute or property value as a sequence of bytes.
Docs.exception: is null.

exception.para: is less than zero or greater than the length of .
The is not large enough to contain bytes starting at the specified .

Docs.exception: An I/O error occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: public int ReadTextValue (char[] buffer, int offset, int count);
.method public hidebysig instance int32 ReadTextValue(char[] buffer, int32 offset, int32 count) cil managed

Docs.param: The buffer to read data into.
The offset into the buffer to start reading data.
The number of characters to read.
Docs.summary: Reads the raw attribute or property value as a sequence of unicode characters.
Docs.returns: The total number of characters read into the buffer. This can be less than the number of characters requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero (0) if the end of the stream has been reached.
Docs.remarks: Reads the raw attribute or property value as a sequence of unicode characters.
Docs.exception: is null.

exception.para: is less than zero or greater than the length of .
The is not large enough to contain characters starting at the specified .

Docs.exception: An I/O error occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object ReadValue() cil managed

Docs.summary: Reads the value.
Docs.remarks: Reads an attribute or property value as its native type.
Docs.exception: There are no more values to read or the value could not be read.
The TNEF stream is truncated and the value could not be read.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool ReadValueAsBoolean() cil managed

Docs.summary: Reads the value as a boolean.
Docs.remarks: Reads any integer-based attribute or property value as a boolean.
Docs.exception: There are no more values to read or the value could not be read as a boolean.

The TNEF stream is truncated and the value could not be read.
